abstract: JPMorgan Chase, Citigroup and Credit Suisse will be the lead underwriters for the Carlyle Group’s impending initial public offering.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase, Citigroup and Credit Suisse will be the lead underwriters for the Carlyle Group’s impending initial public offering.
lead_paragraph: As it prepares to go public, the Carlyle Group has picked three banks — JPMorgan Chase, Citigroup and Credit Suisse — to lead its pending initial public offering, people briefed on the matter told DealBook on Friday.

headline.main: Carlyle Picks 3 Banks as Underwriters for I.P.O.

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
